评论概述: ordered 3 different colors, like 3 different pants!
评论详情: I ordered black, burgundy and heather in medium. The black pair ankle holes were so small i thought I was going to rip the fabric putting them on, they were skin tight through the calf but very loose from knee to mid thigh, fit great (nice and loose/comfy) everywhere else. The heather grey pair is the only one I'm keeping, but they are still strangely loose around the knees. This was the most stiff fabric, very swishy and the least stretchy. The burgundy are more pink than red in opinon, which is a deal breaker for me. But they are sort of in the middle of the other two fits: I could get them on (not easily) and were moderately tight through the knee, enough you look like you're wearing jodhpurs. These were also the stretchiest of the 3 pairs, by a lot, which I liked, the fabric was a bit softer too. I am 5'7" 145#, relatively beefy lower body, but my calves aren't freakish or anything, so I don't know what happened there... Also tried a large pair, which were huge, and I generally like my pants to fit loose.
Great scrubs! Great color
Little short for me, otherwise good fit
They fit very well. I’m 5’1 and a size 12, ordered large

If you are on the heavy side like I am, we know that scrubs are the best pants to wear because it dries fast and helps avoid friction between legs... However... This is the first time I have bought a 3XL that feels way too big. Anyway, it's not all bad. There's more pros, but one issue was a deal breaker for me. Maybe this is more designed for male than ot is for female because there's just too much room "down" there.  Pros: 1. The measurement is accurate, 2. Feels nice on the stomach 3. Plenty nice room around the legs 2. Good inseam, plenty of room for adjustment-- so tall or short person can wear (just cut the excess fabric)  Cons: 1. The rise is way too deep. Like deeeeeep, it almost reached the top of my leg! Which then defies the purpose of buying it in the first place (avoiding friction between legs).  Just because it feels to deep for me doesn't mean it would be too deep for another person. So I've attached some photos for reference.
Kind of thin material. Seams not great. Seems to run small. Personally, I would not buy these again.

I’m wondering why do they only wanna give me back half of what I paid for it I got them today and I started the return today. I have a month to turn it back in. I’m not gonna accept half of the pay.

These pewter scrub bottoms are hands down some of the most comfortable and flattering scrubs I’ve ever worn. As someone who works long shifts in healthcare, I need scrubs that can keep up with me, and these deliver in every way.  Comfort: The fabric is soft, stretchy, and breathable, making it perfect for moving around all day. Whether I’m bending, stretching, or sitting for extended periods, the material never feels restrictive. Plus, the waistband is elastic with a drawstring, providing a secure fit without digging in or rolling down.  Fit and Flattering Design: These scrubs have a modern, tailored fit that feels professional and stylish. The tapered legs give them a sleek look without being too tight, and the pockets are perfectly placed and functional without adding bulk. The pewter color is also versatile and looks great paired with a variety
